Description
===========

Orange County Lettings is a start-up in the real estate rental sector. 
The start-up is in a great expansion in the United States.

The goal of this project was to optimize the existing site by:
    * refactoring the modular architecture
    * solving the various problems of the application
    * setting up a monitoring system via Sentry
    * set up a CI/CD pipeline
    * documenting the application
